item.tinkerscalibration.cutlass.descript: The Cutlass is a fast weapon, whose melee speed will be faster and faster in a continuous attack.
item.tinkerscalibration.hard_wheat_rod.t: Completely inedible like that. They need to be softened up, even your sweaty palms aren't enough for that. They should probably soak in some water for a while.
item.tinkerscalibration.wet_soft_noodles: Now they're all wet, even your spaghetti arms can bend them now. Let's hang them up and get them dry.
item.tinkerscalibration.dry_cold_noodles: Well, that's better, but they still taste gross. Warming them up should make them edible. They might even be good enough to get you off your weak knees.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.bamboo_growi: Like new bamboo shoots after the rain!
The tool repairs itself in water (rain).
modifier.tinkerscalibration.dash.descrip: While sprinting, the tool's melee damage, dig speed, and arrow velocity are increased by 20 times the player's speed.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.fragile_like: Each level increases the chance of additional durability loss during use by 15%, and each trigger consumes 5 times the trait level in durability.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.gobber_bless: This powerful material blesses your tools in every way!
Each level enhances the tool's attributes by 10%.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.gobber_curse: The tool does not have any upgrade slots upon initialization. Replacing existing parts with Gobber parts requires at least two upgrade slots, and all existing upgrade slots are reset upon replacement.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.gobber_bless: This even more powerful material blesses your tools in every way!
Each level enhances the tool's attributes by 20%.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.gobber_curse: The tool does not have any upgrade slots, ability slots, or defense slots upon initialization. Replacing existing parts with Nether Gobber parts requires at least two upgrade slots and defense slots(for armor), and all existing upgrade slots, ability slots, and defense slots are reset upon replacement.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.hydrophilous: When the player is in water, the tool's melee damage and dig speed are increased.
The tool becomes increasingly durable with continuous use.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.levitate.fla: The view up here is great, go take a look.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.levitate.des: Grants the target 60 ticks of levitation per level, with the effect level equal to the trait level.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.light_like_g: Each level increases the bow draw speed by 5%.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.overslime_ar: The tool's melee damage, dig speed, and bow draw speed increase with the amount of slime coating.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.overslime_em: Each level increases the maximum slime coating by 15% of the tool's durability.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.purgatory.fl: The Nether is a great place!
modifier.tinkerscalibration.purgatory.de: When the player is in the Nether dimension, the tool's melee damage, dig speed, and arrow velocity are increased by 8%.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.refined.desc: Each level increases the tool's durability by 30%, melee damage by 10%, and arrow velocity by 10%.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.airblade.des: When the player or the attack target is in the air, each level adds 6 points of damage.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.sharp_like_g: Each level increases the tool's melee damage by 5%.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.united.descr: Each level enhances the tool's attributes by 30%, armor value by 40%, and armor toughness by 40%. Each level also adds 3 upgrade slots, 2 ability slots, and 2 defense slots (for armor).
modifier.tinkerscalibration.gobber_unbre: Possesses the unbreakable quality of End Gobber tools.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.darkness.fla: The environment of the Dark Tower makes it love darkness.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.darkness.des: The tool's melee damage, dig speed, and draw speed increase as the ambient light decreases.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.igneous.desc: The tool becomes sharper and stronger permanently in fire.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.familiar.des: When the player attacks the same mob twice in a row, the second attack deals an additional 25% damage per level, non-stackable.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.vengeance.fl: The flames of vengeance burn fiercely!
modifier.tinkerscalibration.vengeance.de: Deals an additional 25% damage per level during revenge attacks, non-stackable.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.stone_cold.d: Deals an additional 50% damage to full health targets.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.subdue.descr: The weapon deals additional damage to targets with armor value. The higher value, the more damage.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.dominate.fla: I am the master of the world!
modifier.tinkerscalibration.dominate.des: Deals damage based on the target's remaining health.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.bloodthirsty: The scent of blood drives it mad!
The weapon's melee speed or arrow velocity increases with continuous use.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.tastyrewrite: It smells so good that you can't resist leaving a few tooth marks on this tool.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.ecological.d: The tool can be repaired using dirt.
When applied to melee tools or weapons, dig speed increases by 10% per level in the Overworld, and damage increases by 8% per level in other dimensions. When applied to ranged weapons, bow draw speed increases by 30% per level in the Overworld, and arrow velocity increases by 30% per level in other dimensions.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.blacksmith.d: Slightly increases tool durability, and tool attributes improve at lower altitudes.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.blazerite.de: Deals extra damage to burning mobs, which can be further enhanced by fiery.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.enderite.des: Deals extra damage to the Ender family.
Deals extra damage to Piglin Brutes.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.phanterite.d: Makes your enemies have nowhere to hide.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.photovoltaic: Triggers a beneficial effect in sunlight.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.prismarite.f: The ocean whispers in your ear.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.prismarite.d: Deals higher damage to water-fearing and fire-resistant mobs. Increases speed in the ocean.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.chimerite.de: Attacks or mining may summon Chime Gems.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.purify.descr: Mining Wintum ores may yield Pure Wintum Powder.
Attacks have a chance to deal damage based on the enemy's maximum health.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.laceratingti: Causes the target to bleed, dealing additional damage.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.maiming.flav: What makes you think you can fight me?
modifier.tinkerscalibration.icy.descript: Slows enemies. Slowly regenerates durability in cold areas and slowly degrades durability in hot areas.
Deals additional magical damage on attack.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.clustering.d: Increases additional melee damage when total durability is high, and increases dig speed when total durability is low.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.soluble.desc: Rapidly degrades durability when held in water, faster at higher temperatures.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.birefringent: Has a chance to deal an equal amount of damage again on attack.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.peaceenerget: Calm down, do you feel the energy flowing through your body?
Consumes soul to provide a life recovery effect when the user is critically low on health.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.pyroelectric: Deals damage to nearby enemies when attacking, with higher damage in hotter environments.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.shaking.desc: Causes enemies to briefly float in the air.
Heating and decomposing in the absence of air.
Drops coal when mining stone with a chance.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.moon_power.f: When did the bright moon appear?
modifier.tinkerscalibration.lionheart.de: Grants the Lionheart effect on attack.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.envy.descrip: Steals the target's movement speed as melee speed.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.gluttonic.de: Hitting a target causes hunger and restores hunger points, but does not drop food.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.chemicalinst: Has a chance to produce a small explosion when used.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.infernalblaz: Causes the user to ignite while holding it.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.hyper.descri: Grants the user speed and urgency effects.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.oracular.des: Purifies the target's beneficial effects and the user's detrimental effects.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.steamy.descr: Reduces melee damage but increases knockback.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.decoying.des: Has a chance to summon animals when used.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.vibrating.de: Continuous use increases knockback but decreases speed.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.combustion_s: Causes more damage and durability loss when the target is on fire.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.blowing.desc: Has a chance to disarm the target.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.respect.desc: Deals extra damage to enemies whose gaze intersects with yours.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.critical_spe: The tool's melee speed or draw speed increases with each critical hit.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.gravitydiseq: Hold the ground to make your enemies feel a hundred times the gravity!
modifier.tinkerscalibration.protogenesis: Use local materials that adapt to the environment!
Native materials make you immune to the strange fields in the EverDawn/EverBright dimension.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.treewall.fla: Meet force with force, water with earth.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.treewall.des: Using the tool will prioritize depleting the Tree Wall instead of durability. Each level increases the cap by one point, and there is a chance to fully restore it every 12 seconds.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.sweetheart.d: Makes the tool edible; eating it does not increase hunger or saturation but restores some durability.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.weatherbeate: Reduces the probability of durability loss in cold and warm biomes.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.accumulate.d: Draws energy from the surrounding environment and stores it as coal in your inventory.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.crystalaccur: Each level +0.1 accuracy, but reduces movement speed by 20% per level while charging.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.grind.descri: Deals more damage to low-armor targets and applies a slowing effect.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.extremespeed: The fastest martial arts in the world!
Possesses extreme speed, but loses more durability.
The fastest martial arts in the world!
Possesses extreme speed, but loses more durability.
The higher the armor toughness, the higher the protection factor.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.global_trave:
While sneaking, right-click (left-click for ranged weapons) on a container to bind it. Destroyed blocks and drops from killed mobs will be teleported to it.
Detailed information can be viewed on the attribute values page.
The tool consumes picked-up experience to repair itself.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.scute.descri: Grants the tool an additional defense slot.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.defense_resp: Grants the tool an additional defense slot.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.overshield.d:
A punch on the slime!
Absorbs damage.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.sharp_like_g: Has a 60% chance to deal 150% thorns damage to attackers and a 20% chance to take 120% of the damage.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.overslime_ar: The more overslime, the stronger the armor's attributes.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.impregnable_: The armor becomes increasingly durable with continuous attacks.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.darkness_arm: The environment of the Dark Tower makes it love darkness.
Grants resistance boost effects in low-light environments.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.twilit_armor: That faint light is the blessing of the Twilight Forest.
Higher toughness when in the Twilight Forest, higher armor value in other dimensions.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.retribution_: Steals the attacker's movement speed when continuously attacked.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.vengeance_ar: The flames of vengeance burn fiercely!
Has a chance to deal 150% retaliation damage when continuously attacked by the same creature.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.familiar_arm: Reduces damage taken when continuously attacked by the same entity.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.dash_armor.d: Armor value gradually increases while sprinting.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.igneous_armo: The armor becomes stronger in fire.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.blowing_armo: Has a chance to disarm attackers.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.oracular_arm: Cleanses positive effects from attackers and negative effects from the user.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.dominate_arm: I am the master of the world!
The higher the user's health, the more damage their attacks deal.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.bamboo_growi: The armor repairs itself in water (rain).
modifier.tinkerscalibration.subdue_armor: The higher the user's health, the better the armor's protection factor.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.enderference: Prevents attacker from teleporting for a short time
modifier.tinkerscalibration.bloodthirsty: The scent of blood drives it mad!
The weapon's melee speed increases with each consecutive hit.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.respect_armo: Reduces damage from enemies that cross the user's line of sight.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.levitate_arm: The view up here is great, go take a look.
Gives attackers a 3-second levitation effect per level, with the effect level equal to the trait level.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.lion_heart_a: Gains Lion Heart effect when attacking.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.over_natural: Extends the user's invincibility frame duration and has a chance to cause magical retaliation damage when hit.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.hydrophilous: Significantly increases the player's swim speed.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.refined_armo: Each level increases tool durability by 30% and armor toughness by 10%.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.compatible_a: Increases the user's melee damage and dig speed.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.welltrained_: Randomly reduces a certain amount of damage.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.blazerite_ar: Immune to fire and increases movement speed in lava.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.golderite_ar: Piglins will not attack you due to fear of damaging your armor.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.enderite_arm: Teleports you to a safe area when you are about to die in the void.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.phanterite_a: Immune to fall damage and allows you to step up one block high.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.spiderite_ar: Can climb walls like a spider.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.prismarite_a: The ocean whispers in your ear.
Increases swim speed, immune to mining fatigue, and allows breathing underwater.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.featherite_a: Can walk on water and lava, immune to levitation effect, and reduces fall damage.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.circulation_: In the Overworld, attacking grants speed effect; being attacked slows the attacker. In other dimensions, attacking grants strength effect; being attacked ignites the attacker.
Enhances armor toughness and knockback resistance.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.blacksmith_a: Slightly increases armor durability and boosts defense at lower altitudes.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.maiming_armo: What makes you think you can fight me?
modifier.tinkerscalibration.clustering_a: Increases additional melee damage when total tool durability is high; otherwise, increases speed.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.soluble_armo: Rapidly decreases durability and pushes the wearer in water, with faster degradation at higher temperatures.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.birefringent: Has a chance to trigger double armor reduction when attacked.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.peace_energe: Calm down, do you feel the energy flowing through your body?
modifier.tinkerscalibration.lifeinspire_: Consumes soul to provide health regeneration when the user is critically low on health.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.pyro_electri: Deals damage to nearby enemies when attacked, with higher damage at higher environmental temperatures.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.shaking_armo: Causes attackers to be briefly airborne.
Grants speed and urgency effects when monsters are nearby.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.dichroic_arm: Increases protection coefficient in bright environments and knockback resistance in dark environments.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.stamina_focu: Provides resistance boost effects while sneaking.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.vibrating_ar: Pushes attackers back but reduces the wearer's speed when hit consecutively.
modifier.tinkerscalibration.necroticrewr: Hits on enemies drains their life to heal you, Higher on critical hits.
recipe.tinkerscalibration.overshield.ove: Overshield requires Overslime as a prerequisite
modifier.tinkerscalibration.global.valid: Bound container is valid within this dimension
modifier.tinkerscalibration.global.inval: Bound container does not exist or is invalid
modifier.tinkerscalibration.global.diffe: Bound container is not in this dimension, cannot determine validity
modifier.tconstruct.spaghetti1: I guess they're all right... but it's just not the same.
modifier.tconstruct.spaghetti1_1: They definitely need some sauce, but it has to be red.
modifier.tconstruct.spaghetti2: Something is missing.. could use some meat. Mama always used meat.
modifier.tconstruct.spaghetti2_1: I should get a bowl of meat soup.
modifier.tconstruct.spaghetti3: Just like mama used to make them.
material.tinkerscalibration.obsidian.fla: Formed by the sudden cooling of lava.
material.tinkerscalibration.obsidian.enc:
When the player is on fire, the tool has a chance to accumulate 0.1 Igneous points every five seconds. Each level increases the probability by 60% and adds 20 points to the maximum.
Each 1 Igneous point increases attack damage, mining speed, and the chance of not consuming durability when using the tool by 10% (up to 10% per level).
In the Nether, each level increases the tool's attack damage, mining speed, and draw speed by 8%.
material.tinkerscalibration.lindsteel.en: The tool becomes more durable with continuous use.
material.tinkerscalibration.fazelle.ency: While sprinting, the tool's attack damage, mining speed, and arrow velocity are increased by 20 times the player's speed.
material.tinkerscalibration.mandite.flav:
An alloy of two tier 4 alloys.
You ask me why it's not called 'Marlins'? Ask smartgenius5558.
material.tinkerscalibration.mandite.ency:
Focused on speed!
The tool's (weapon) attack speed and mining speed increase with continuous use. The mining speed is further enhanced at the cost of movement speed.
material.tinkerscalibration.emperorslime: The ruler of the Slime Empire.
The tool's attack damage, mining speed, and draw speed increase with the amount of slime coating.
material.tinkerscalibration.gobber.encyc: Blesses your tools in all aspects, but also curses your upgrade slots.
material.tinkerscalibration.carminite.fl: The core power source of the machinery in the Dark Tower, also a choice for making tools.
material.tinkerscalibration.carminite.en: When the environment light level is below 9, the tool's attack damage, mining speed, or draw speed increases as the light level decreases.
material.tinkerscalibration.gobbernether: Blesses your tools in all aspects, but also curses your upgrade slots and ability slots.
material.tinkerscalibration.mangobbersli: Each level increases your tool's stats by 40% and grants 3 additional upgrade slots and 2 additional ability slots.
material.tinkerscalibration.hymon.flavor: From the depths of the ocean!
material.tinkerscalibration.hymon.encycl: Embrace the sea! When the player is in water, the tool's attack damage and mining speed are increased.
material.tinkerscalibration.titanium.fla: Element number 22 on the periodic table.
material.tinkerscalibration.redmatter.en: Armor backlash, and noble percentage damage!
material.tinkerscalibration.purpur.encyc: When hitting a target, gives the target a 60-tick floating effect, with the effect level equal to the trait level + 1.
material.tinkerscalibration.blazewood.en: Automatic smelting, fiery and heat conduction.
material.tinkerscalibration.refinedquart: Reinforced quartz, quartz reinforced with diamonds.
material.tinkerscalibration.soulgold.enc: Remembers the mobs you have harmed and those that have harmed you!
material.tinkerscalibration.emerald.ency: Has different effects in different dimensions.
material.tinkerscalibration.diamond.ency: Has a chance to give you some surprises when obtaining loot.
material.tinkerscalibration.netherite.en: Powered by the forces of the Nether!
material.tinkerscalibration.bnetherite.e: Fused with the power of blaze!
material.tinkerscalibration.enetherite.e: Fused with the power of the Ender!
material.tinkerscalibration.fnetherite.e: Fused with the power of feathers!
material.tinkerscalibration.gnetherite.e: Fused with the power of gold!
material.tinkerscalibration.pnetherite.e: Fused with the power of phantoms!
Fused with the power of the ocean!
material.tinkerscalibration.snetherite.e: Fused with the power of spiders!
material.tinkerscalibration.wnetherite.e: Fused with the power of the Wither!
material.tinkerscalibration.alumite.flav: Ten years of tinker, expecting never to decline.
material.tinkerscalibration.alumite.ency: Pick up your tools and relive that journey of tinker.
material.tinkerscalibration.corundum.fla: The second hardest substance in nature!
material.tinkerscalibration.corundum.enc: Weakens enemies, with different bonuses depending on durability.
material.tinkerscalibration.nitre.flavor: One of the ingredients for making gunpowder.
material.tinkerscalibration.nitre.encycl:
Potassium, sodium, and ammonium salts are all soluble.
Sodium bismuthate, potassium chloroplatinate, ammonium chloroplatinate: What did you say?
The purest calcium carbonate crystal in nature.
material.tinkerscalibration.tourmaline.e: Has a chance to release an electric arc.
material.tinkerscalibration.sunstone.enc: Restores durability in sunlight, attacks deal fire damage.
material.tinkerscalibration.moonstone.en: Restores durability in moonlight, attacks grant temporary night vision.
material.tinkerscalibration.topaz.flavor: Calm and composed, this is a good quality.
material.tinkerscalibration.prehnite.enc: Consumes 'souls' to provide health recovery when the user is critically low on health.
material.tinkerscalibration.vibrating_cr: Continuous use increases knockback but reduces speed.
material.tinkerscalibration.stellarium.f: The sun is in your hand!
material.tinkerscalibration.inertwitheri: Seems to have lost its activity due to long burial.
material.tinkerscalibration.halleium.fla: Shouldn't it appear in the End?
material.tinkerscalibration.steamium.fla: Now it's the age of steam!
material.tinkerscalibration.magiga.flavo: Every sorcerer has a melee dream.
material.tinkerscalibration.cherry.flavo: Pink on the outside, black inside.
material.tinkerscalibration.starlit.flav: A close relative of the Starlit Crusher.
material.tinkerscalibration.maple.flavor: Maple leaves are redder than February flowers.
material.tinkerscalibration.stellarium.e: Releases stellar power to ignite surrounding creatures on attack.
material.tinkerscalibration.immersedsilv: Deals extra damage to enemies whose lines of sight intersect.
material.tinkerscalibration.wither.encyc: Weakens and withers the target, increases your armor value.
material.tinkerscalibration.halleium.enc: Swaps positions with the target on attack.
material.tinkerscalibration.oraclium.enc: Purifies the target's beneficial effects and the user's harmful effects.
material.tinkerscalibration.steamium.enc: Reduces melee damage, increases knockback, disarms the target.
material.tinkerscalibration.magiga.encyc: Has a chance to deal extra magical damage on attack.
material.tinkerscalibration.gravity.ency: Causes surrounding enemies to feel intense gravity.
material.tinkerscalibration.chdawn.encyc: Deals damage to similar targets within a certain range on attack; deals extra damage if the target's armor value is lower than yours.
material.tinkerscalibration.starlit.ency: Prioritizes consumption of tree walls when using the tool.
material.tinkerscalibration.maple.encycl: Reduces durability consumption probability in cold and warm biomes per level.
material.tinkerscalibration.horizonite.e: Draws energy from the surrounding environment.
material.tinkerscalibration.pyrope.encyc: Why not witnessing the real speed!
material.tinkerscalibration.ventium.ency: Similar with iron in all aspects, perhaps it's a kind of iron alloy.
material.tinkerscalibration.moonsteel.en: Deals extra damage to low-armor targets / improves arrow accuracy.
material.tconstruct.pig_iron.encyclopedi: Edible, increases hunger by 3 points and saturation recovery by 4 points per level.
death.attack.tinkerscalibration.fibergla: %1$s was pierced by shards of glass
%1$s was pierced by shards of glass while fighting against %2$s
